Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: A C15 fatty acid chain is attahced to the N-terminus of the peptide (XXL). The carboxyl-terminal Ile is connected to Thr by ester linkage (XXJ). In addition, the first and fourth K's are ornithine (represented with K).
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Isolation of a Paenibacillus sp. strain and structural elucidation of its broad-spectrum lipopeptide antibiotic.
Literature.Author: Guo Y, Huang E, Yuan C, Zhang L, Yousef AE.
